item.text: Jesus spoke to them again in parables, saying:

“The <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> can be <st data-num="3666" class="">compared</st> to a <st data-num="935">king</st> <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">gave</st> a <st data-num="1062">wedding banquet</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st>.

He <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="2564" class="">summon</st> those who had been <st data-num="2564" class="">invited</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1062" class="">banquet</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> they <st data-num="2309" class="">would</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>.

<st data-num="3825" class="">Again</st> he <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, ‘<st data-num="3004" class="">Tell</st> those who have been <st data-num="2564" class="">invited</st>, “<st data-num="2400">Look</st>! The <st data-num="712" class="">feast</st> I have <st data-num="2090" class="">prepared</st> for you is ready.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">My</st> <st data-num="5022" class="">oxen</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4619">fattened cattle</st> have been <st data-num="2380" class="">slaughtered</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> is <st data-num="2092" class="">ready</st>. <st data-num="1205" class="">Come</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1062" class="">wedding banquet</st>.”’

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> they were <st data-num="272" class="">indifferent</st> and <st data-num="565">went away</st>, <st data-num="3739">one</st> <st data-num="1519">to</st> <st data-num="2398">his</st> <st data-num="68" class="">farm</st>, <st data-num="3739">another</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1711" class="">business</st>.

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st> <st data-num="2902" class="">seized</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st>, <st data-num="5195">insolently mistreated</st> them, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="615" class="">killed</st> them.

<st data-num="1161" class="">The</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> was <st data-num="3710" class="">furious</st>! He <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4753" class="">soldiers</st>, and they <st data-num="622" class="">put</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="5406" class="">murderers</st> <st data-num="622">to death</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1714">set</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st><n id="3" /> on <st data-num="1714" class="">fire</st>.

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st>, ‘The <st data-num="1062" class="">wedding</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2092" class="">ready</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the ones who had been <st data-num="2564" class="">invited</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="514" class="">worthy</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="1327">main</st> <st data-num="3598">streets</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">invite</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">everyone</st> you <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1062">wedding banquet</st>.’

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st> <st data-num="1831">went out</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">streets</st> and <st data-num="4863" class="">gathered</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> they <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st>, <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">bad</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1062">wedding hall</st> was <st data-num="4130" class="">filled</st> with <st data-num="345" class="">guests</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when the <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> <st data-num="1525">came in</st> to <st data-num="2300" class="">see</st> the <st data-num="345">wedding guests</st>, he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> who was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1746" class="">wearing</st> <st data-num="1062" class="">wedding</st> <st data-num="1742" class="">clothes</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, ‘<st data-num="2083">Friend</st>, <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> did you <st data-num="1525">get in</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> <st data-num="3361 2192">without</st> <st data-num="1062">wedding</st> <st data-num="1742" class="">clothes?’</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he had <st data-num="5392">nothing to say</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to his <st data-num="1249" class="">attendants</st>, ‘<st data-num="1210" class="">Tie</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> up <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">foot</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">throw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="1857">outer darkness</st>,<n id="1" /> where <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2805" class="">weeping</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1030" class="">gnashing</st> of <st data-num="3599" class="">teeth!’</st>
For many are called, but few are chosen.”
Then the Pharisees went out and planned together to entrap him with his own words.

They <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> along <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="2265" class="">Herodians</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="1320" class="">Teacher</st>, we <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="227" class="">truthful</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1321" class="">teach</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">way</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1722">in accordance with</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771">You</st> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3199" class="">court</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">anyone’s</st> favor <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> you <st data-num="991" class="">show</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4383" class="">partiality</st>.<n id="3" />
Tell us then, what do you think? Is it right to pay taxes to Caesar or not?”
But Jesus realized their evil intentions and said, “Hypocrites! Why are you testing me?

<st data-num="1925" class="">Show</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> the <st data-num="3546" class="">coin</st> used for the <st data-num="2778" class="">tax</st>.” <st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="4374" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> a <st data-num="1220" class="">denarius</st>.<n id="2" />

Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Whose</st> <st data-num="1504" class="">image</st><n id="2" /> is <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> whose <st data-num="1923" class="">inscription</st>?”

They <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="2541" class="">Caesar’s</st>.” He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="591" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="591" class="">give</st> to <st data-num="2541" class="">Caesar</st> <st data-num="3588">the things</st> that are <st data-num="2581">Caesar’s</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3588">the things</st> that are <st data-num="2316" class="">God’s</st>.”<n id="3" />
Now when they heard this they were stunned, and they left him and went away.
The same day Sadducees (who say there is no resurrection) came to him and asked him,
“Teacher, Moses said, ‘If a man dies without having children, his brother must marry the widow and father children for his brother.’

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">among</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>. The <st data-num="4413">first one</st> <st data-num="1060" class="">married</st> and <st data-num="5053" class="">died</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> since he <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4690" class="">children</st> he <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st>.

The <st data-num="1208" class="">second</st> did the <st data-num="3668" class="">same</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5154" class="">third</st>, <st data-num="2193">down to</st> the <st data-num="2033" class="">seventh</st>.
<st data-num="5306">Last</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>, the <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="599" class="">died</st>.

<st data-num="1722" class="">In</st> the <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st>, <st data-num="3767" class="">therefore</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">whose</st> wife of the <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> will <st data-num="1135" class="">she</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st>? <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> they <st data-num="3956">all</st> had <st data-num="2192" class="">married</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>.”<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “You are <st data-num="4105" class="">deceived</st><n id="2" /> because you <st data-num="1492" class="">don’t</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> the <st data-num="1124" class="">scriptures</st> <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st> they <st data-num="3777" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="1060" class="">marry</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> are <st data-num="1061">given in marriage</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>.

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="4012">as for</st> the <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st> of the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>, have you <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="314" class="">read</st> <st data-num="3588">what</st> was <st data-num="3004">spoken</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,<n id="1" />
‘I am the God of Abraham, the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob’? He is not the God of the dead but of the living!”
When the crowds heard this, they were amazed at his teaching.
Now when the Pharisees heard that he had silenced the Sadducees, they assembled together.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, an <st data-num="3544" class="">expert in religious law</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1905" class="">asked</st> him <st data-num="1905">a question</st> to <st data-num="3985" class="">test</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him:</st>

“<st data-num="1320" class="">Teacher</st>, <st data-num="4169" class="">which</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">commandment</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> is the <st data-num="3173" class="">greatest</st>?”<n id="1" />
Jesus said to him, “‘Love the Lord your God with all your heart, with all your soul, and with all your mind.’

<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">greatest</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1785" class="">commandment</st>.
The second is like it: ‘Love your neighbor as yourself.’
All the law and the prophets depend on these two commandments.”
While the Pharisees were assembled, Jesus asked them a question:

“<st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> do <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1380" class="">think</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">Whose</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> <st data-num="1510">is</st> he?” They <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “The son of <st data-num="1138">David</st>.”<n id="2" />
He said to them, “How then does David by the Spirit call him ‘Lord,’ saying,

“‘The Lord said to my lord,

“Sit at my right hand,

until I put your enemies under your feet”’?
If David then calls him ‘Lord,’ how can he be his son?”
No one was able to answer him a word, and from that day on no one dared to question him any longer.
